com.palantir.giraffe.ssh

Class KerberosSshCredential

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.palantir.giraffe.host.Credential<SshAuthenticator>
      • com.palantir.giraffe.ssh.SshCredential
        • com.palantir.giraffe.ssh.KerberosSshCredential

  • public class KerberosSshCredential
extends SshCredential
    Authenticates SSH connections via GSS-API in a Kerberos environment.

    • Field Detail

      • DEBUG_PROPERTY

        public static final String DEBUG_PROPERTY
        System property to enable Kerberos debug output when set to true. Note that debug output is verbose and is printed directly to standard out. This is a limitation of Java's Kerberos implementation.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • of

        public static KerberosSshCredential of(String username)

      • authenticate

        public void authenticate(SshAuthenticator authenticator)
                  throws IOException
        Description copied from class: Credential
        Authenticates the connection managed by the given Authenticator using this credential.

        This method participates in the visitor pattern with methods defined by Authenticator implementations.

        Specified by:
        authenticate in class Credential<SshAuthenticator>
        Parameters:
        authenticator - the Authenticator for the connection
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - if authentication fails
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs while authenticating the connection
